Package system

Interface Summary
JPregelConstants A set of constants that define the configuration of the system
ManagerToMaster An interface that defines the contract between a Worker Manager and a master
MessageSpooler An interface that models every Worker Manager as a spooler of incoming messages for the next superstep
WorkerManager Models a remote worker manager executing on any machine in the cluster.
 

Class Summary
Communicator This class aggregates messages which are meant to be other machines at the end of a superstep.
DataLocator Singleton class that finds location of partitions and other data at runtime
MasterImpl  
Message Represents messages that are communicated among Vertices at the end of a superstep.
Worker Represents a worker thread executing in every Worker Manager
WorkerManagerImpl Implementation of interface worker manager.
 

Enum Summary
Communicator.CommunicatorState  
Worker.WorkerState
